games.title: Fraction Builder
games.description: Build and visualize fractions with interactive pie charts and number lines.

games.title: Fraction Wars
games.description: Battle with equivalent fractions in this strategic card game.

games.title: Pizza Party
games.description: Learn fractions by dividing pizzas and sharing with friends!
